mapper.update:
update order_ticket_detail_his set
total_price=#{total_price},
sid=#{sid},
tid=#{tid},
inv_allup=#{inv_allup},
price_allup=#{price_allup},
status=#{status},
alive_m=#{alive_m},
product=#{product},
payouttime=#{payouttime},
where local_m=#{local_m}
mapper.select: select from order_ticket_detail_his where local_m = #{local_m}
select count(1) from order_ticket_detail_his

select sum(c.mid) from ( select count(a.mid)as mid from(select distinct(h.mid) from match_product_his h where h.payouttime >=#{startDate} and h.payouttime < #{endDate}) a union all select count(b.mid)as mid from(select distinct(p.mid) from match_product p where p.payouttime >=#{startDate} and p.payouttime < #{endDate}) b ) c
select count(a.mid) from(select distinct(p.mid) from match_product_his p where p.payouttime >=#{startDate} and p.payouttime < #{endDate}) a

select #{monweekDate} as weekDate , (select date_format(#{monStartNumDate},'%Y-%m-%d')) as startNumDate, (select SUM(c.totalInvestment) AS totalInvestment from (select SUM(f.totalInvestment) as totalInvestment from order_ticket_info_his f where f.id in(select distinct(a.tid) from (select distinct(d.tid) from order_ticket_detail_his d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} union all select distinct(d.tid) from order_ticket_detail d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} )as a) union all select SUM(f.totalInvestment) as totalInvestment from order_ticket_info f where f.id in(select distinct(a.tid) from (select distinct(d.tid) from order_ticket_detail_his d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} union all select distinct(d.tid) from order_ticket_detail d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} )as a)) as c) as totalInvestment, (select count(a.mid) from(select distinct(p.mid) from match_product_his p where p.payouttime >=#{monStartNumDate} and p.payouttime < #{monEndNumDate} union all select distinct(p.mid) from match_product p where p.payouttime >=#{monStartNumDate} and p.payouttime < #{monEndNumDate}) a )as matchNum , (select sum(a.price_allup) from (select sum(d.price_allup) as price_allup from order_ticket_detail_his d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status in (1,2) union all select sum(d.price_allup) as price_allup from order_ticket_detail d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status in (1,2) )as a) as price_allup, (select sum(a.total_price) from (select sum(d.total_price) as total_price from order_ticket_detail_his d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status=1 union all select sum(d.total_price) as total_price from order_ticket_detail d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status=1 ) as a) as total_price, ((select sum(a.total_price) from (select sum(d.total_price) as total_price from order_ticket_detail_his d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status=1 union all select sum(d.total_price) as total_price from order_ticket_detail d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status=1)as a )-(select sum(a.price_allup) from (select sum(d.price_allup) as price_allup from order_ticket_detail_his d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status in (1,2) union all select sum(d.price_allup) as price_allup from order_ticket_detail d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status in (1,2) ) as a))/(select sum(a.price_allup) from (select sum(d.price_allup) as price_allup from order_ticket_detail_his d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status in (1,2) union all select sum(d.price_allup) as price_allup from order_ticket_detail d where d.payouttime >=#{monStartDate} and d.payouttime < #{monEndDate} and d.status in (1,2) )as a )*100 as pl from dual union ALL

SELECT sum(b.totalInvestment) AS totalInvestment FROM ( SELECT SUM(f.totalInvestment) AS totalInvestment FROM order_ticket_info f WHERE f.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT (a.tid) FROM ( SELECT d.tid FROM order_ticket_detail_his d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.payouttime >= #{startDate} and d.payouttime < #{endDate} AND d.local_m > 1 UNION ALL SELECT d.tid FROM order_ticket_detail d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.payouttime >= #{startDate} and d.payouttime < #{endDate} AND d.local_m > 1 ) AS a ) UNION ALL SELECT SUM(f.totalInvestment) AS totalInvestment FROM order_ticket_info_his f WHERE f.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT (a.tid) FROM ( SELECT d.tid FROM order_ticket_detail_his d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.payouttime >= #{startDate} and d.payouttime < #{endDate} AND d.local_m > 1 UNION ALL SELECT d.tid FROM order_ticket_detail d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.payouttime >= #{startDate} and d.payouttime < #{endDate} AND d.local_m > 1 ) AS a ) ) AS b
